title: United Utilities Possible Pensions Dispute (GMB - Britain's General Union)
text: ( Source : GMB - Britain's General Union ) Monday, October 19 , 2015 GMB National Water Forum In Sheffield To Discuss Prospect Of Second Dispute As United Utilities Propose Closure Of Defined Benefit Pension Scheme NAO report of Â£1,250m
